service.name: Pension Bonus Bereavement Payment
service.description: Pension Bonus Bereavement Payment (PBBP)is a tax free lump sum that may be payable to the surviving partner of a deceased member of the Pension Bonus Scheme (PBS), who died on or after 1 January 2008 and had not lodged a successful claim for the Pension Bonus or Age Pension before they passed away.
